snippet.title: Evermore Knights - How it All Began (Story Trailer)
snippet.description:
Welcome to Evermore Knights, a turn-based JRPG where you play as a Commissioner tasked with stopping the mysterious force known as "Dread" plaguing the land of Temeris. Build a team of four unique characters with statistics, attributes, and skills. Explore the world, battle monsters, and level up your team to become the ultimate hero and save Temeris. 

Experience a captivating story with a cast of intriguing characters and use turn-based combat to strategically take on enemies. Equip your team with weapons, armor, and accessories to boost their stats and overcome challenges. Are you ready for the adventure? Play Evermore Knights and find out!

Official Website: https://evermoreknights.com 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/evermoreknights
Discord: https://discord.gg/evermoreknights
Facebook: https://facebook.com/evermoreknightso...
Instagram: https://instagram.com/evermore.knights
Medium: https://creoengineofficial.medium.com
